thread.title: BRIEF-Bioamber Inc Announces Pricing Of US$10 Mln Underwritten Public Offering

title: BRIEF-Bioamber Inc Announces Pricing Of US$10 Mln Underwritten Public Offering

organizations.name: underwritten public offering reuters staff  feb

text:
February 6, 2018 / 11:38 AM / Updated 2 minutes ago BRIEF-Bioamber Inc Announces Pricing Of US$10 Mln Underwritten Public Offering Reuters Staff 
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Bioamber Inc: 
* BIOAMBER INC ANNOUNCES PRICING OF US$10 MILLION UNDERWRITTEN PUBLIC OFFERING 
* BIOAMBER INC - PRICED PUBLIC OFFERING OF 40 MILLION SERIES A UNITS OR EQUIVALENT SERIES B UNITS AT $0.25/SERIES A UNIT & $0.24/SERIES B UNIT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
